title: The Witcher 3 Gets Cross-Save - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.18.20
description:
Get started with your first month free by going to http://forhims.com/gamesdaily.

If you go to http://getquip.com/games right now, you’ll get your first refill free!

Imran and Greg talk about Switcher getting cross-save with PC, Persona 5 Royal's Western changes, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:03:09 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:07:19 - Switcher gets a cross save, Better Graphics patch
00:12:40 - “Will we see more studios do this PC save syncing over to consoles?” - Borzen00
00:16:23 - Persona 5 Royal Changing Homophobic Scenes
00:25:40 - New Switch Lite Color
00:28:06 - Stadia Adding Phones
00:33:15 - Out today
00:34:34 - “Today, all of Kingdom Hearts is available on Xbox…” - The Nano Biologist
00:39:37 -  Hims
00:41:02 - Quip  
 Reader mail   -
00:42:24 - “This is my first time writing in and it‘s to ask your opinion about the Playstation Player Celebration...” - Marleynito
00:48:00 - “Nintendo is opening up pop up switch lounges in select airports…” - Frankfurtter
00:51:45 - “When will big companies give consumers the full power of customization and let us create personal system skins?” - Ricky Mcflyy
00:53:44 - Squad Up: Robert Mimms - PSN - JohnLAceEsquire
00:55:44 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Whitta

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
